Headline: Temporary Westbound #51 51st Reroute near 51st/Union
ShortDescription: Westbound #51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted near 51st/Union.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Halsted, 51st, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 51st/Union.

Eastbound  buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near 47th/Cornelia
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, 39th and Lake Shore Drive, due to street blockage near 47th/Cornelia.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, 39th and Lake Shore Drive, due to street blockage near 47th/Cornelia.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near 59th/State
ShortDescription: #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 59th/State

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 59th/State.

Southbound buses will operate via State, 58th, Wabash, 60th, then resume their normal route on State.

Northbound buses will operate via State, 61st, Wabash, 58th, then resume their normal route on State.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute near 59th/State
ShortDescription: #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 59th/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 59th/State.  

Eastbound buses will operate via 59th, Wabash, 61st, then resume their normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via 60th, Wabash, 59th, State, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
